did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: John F. Kennedy assassination conspiracy collection, [ca. 1963-2012]
did.physdesc: Newspapers, Clippings, Manuscripts, Research material, Publications, Printed Material, Films, Videos
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Reports, magazines, newspaper clippings, books, and videos containing analysis of the assassination of President John. F. Kennedy, with emphasis on conspiracy theories about the event.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Reports, magazines, newspaper clippings, books, and videos containing analysis of the assassination of President John. F. Kennedy, with emphasis on conspiracy theories about the event.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.persname: Kennedy, John F. (John Fitzgerald), 1917-1963 -- Death and burial.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: John F. Kennedy assassination conspiracy collection, #8086. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Matrix III, by Vladamar Valerian. 2 parts.
Nomenclature of an Assassination Cabal , by William Torbitt
Questions on the JFK Assassination, by Bertrand Russell

unittitle.title: Dr. Guinn, Neutron Activation Analysis, and the Single Bullet Theory
